title: BRIEF-PSG Financial Services Says HY Dividend Per Share Up By 8% To R1.64
text:
BRIEF-PSG Financial Services Says HY Dividend Per Share Up By 8% To R1.64

Stock Markets 25 minutes ago (Oct 15, 2019 14:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-PSG Financial Services Says HY Dividend Per Share Up By 8% To R1.64 Oct 15 (Reuters) - PSG Financial Services Ltd : * HY DIVIDEND PER SHARE INCREASED BY 8% TO R1.64 (2018: R1.52) * HY HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE INCREASED BY 12% TO R5.68 (2018: R5.07) * HY PROFIT BEFORE FINANCE COSTS AND TAXATION INCREASED BY 17% TO R2.49BN

BRIEF-PSG Financial Services Says HY Dividend Per Share Up By 8% To R1.64
description: BRIEF-PSG Financial Services Says HY Dividend Per Share Up By 8% To R1.64
